name: Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from finished chats in HappyFox Chat
description:
Every time a chat is finished in HappyFox Chat, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. 
 
The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bAhZlbqz3INE9CvBM-hndAxfQ5TKOw1UoMxJhb42ZX4/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
